title: The Match Control Flow Construct
description: In this lab, we will explore the powerful match control flow construct in Rust, which allows for pattern matching and execution of code based on the matched pattern.

meta.title: Mastering the Match Control Flow Construct in Rust
meta.description: Explore the powerful match control flow construct in Rust, learn pattern matching, and discover how to handle all possible cases.
meta.keywords: rust playground, pattern matching, control flow, match, rust tutor, rust online compiler, rust commands, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online
